name: Dai Gyakuten Saiban: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Bōken  (Ace Attorney)
name_original: Dai Gyakuten Saiban: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Bōken  (Ace Attorney)
description:
Dai Gyakuten Saiban: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Bōken (Ace Attorney) is an adventure game developed by Capcom. It was originally released in 2015. Capcom published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Dai Gyakuten Saiban: Naruhodō Ryūnosuke no Bōken (Ace Attorney) is available on Nintendo 3DS, iOS and Android.
